build: pnpm run build:public && pnpm run build:server && pnpm run build:shared
build:watch: concurrently -n public,server,shared "pnpm run build:public:watch" "pnpm run build:server:watch" "pnpm run build:shared:watch"
start:server: nodemon --watch server/dist --watch public/dist --watch shared/dist --exec 'clear && node --no-deprecation' server/dist/server.js
dev: concurrently --raw -n build,server "pnpm run build:watch" "pnpm run start:server"
